title: UIDAI urges parents of children between five and seven to update Aadhaar biometrics
summary: The Unique Identification Authority of India urged parents of children between the age of 5 and 7 to update their kids’ biometrics . The biometric update would be free of cost at enrolment centres, if done before children turned seven . After this period, the authority said it may cancel

title: This Is Why I Put Apple AirTags on Basically Everything
summary: Apple's AirTag uses an ingenious method of tracking itself, detecting its location from nearby iPhones . It uses them to anonymously piggyback the coordinates to a secure server . The AirTag is a smooth, round, 1.26-inch puck that looks like a glossy white breath mint .

title: T-Mobile’s US Cellular acquistion has been approved: What happened, and what’s next?
summary: T-Mobile announced plans to acquire most of US Cellular in a $4.4 billion deal last year . US Cellular will still retain 4,400 towers and focus on leasing them out to other companies . The DOJ and FCC approved the deal without any additional conditions or safeguards .

title: AI Might Now Be as Good as Humans at Detecting Emotion, Political Leaning, and Sarcasm
summary: When we write something to another person, over email or perhaps on social media, we may not state things directly, but our words may instead convey a latent meaning . Can AI, especially conversational AI, understand the latent meaning in our text? And if so, what does this mean for

title: Chief AI Officer at SAP Americas Talks Internal AI Integration
summary: Jared Coyle, chief AI officer at SAP Americas, shares his strategies for integrating AI internally . SAP uses small language models backed by knowledge graphs and striving for AI to be “boring”

title: These Noise-Canceling Earbuds Are Up There With Apple's AirPods 4, and They're a Third of the Price Right Now
summary: The Earfun Air Pro 4s are CNET's 2024 Editors' Choice for affordable in-ear headphones . The black ones cost just $56 on Amazon right now, a 30% discount . They're on sale during Prime Day at $55 for the black pair .

title: Here’s your first look at Google Translate’s Conversation mode redesign (APK teardown)
summary: Google is set to revamp the Google Translate app’s Conversation mode, featuring Gemini-based branding and smarter AI integration . Changes include clearer speaker identification, quick language-switch chips, inline translations, and visual tweaks across automatic and manual modes .

title: Airtel to offer one year free Perplexity Pro subscription to its users
summary: Perplexity is an AI-powered search and answer engine that offers real-time responses to users in a conversational language . Airtel users can avail this offer by logging-on to the Airtle Thanks App . The subscription will be free of cost to all 360 million customers

title: The FCC plans to ban Chinese technology in undersea cables
summary: The Federal Communication Commission plans to vote on new rules banning use of Chinese technology in undersea cables . The proposed rules will apply to any company on the FCC's list of entities that pose "an unacceptable risk to the national security of the United States" Undersea or submarine cables are a key

title: China Is Spending Billions to Become an A.I. Superpower
summary: China is quickly closing the gap with the United States in the contest to make technologies that rival the human brain . title: 2026 Mercedes-Benz CLA feels like a real car, not a science experiment
summary: The Mercedes-Benz CLA is a marked departure from Mercedes' EV efforts . Instead of a dedicated line of EQ vehicles, we're getting vehicles "with EQ Technology" The CLA returns for the 2026 model year as an EV first (with a hybrid coming) on an all-new 800
